message.body: good answer. i have to think about it for a second.
I mean, don't think too hard about it.
cute. um, i'm picking a bottle of nail polish, one of my favorite books, and a bag of clay?
Nail polish? Really? And name the book
i like painting my nails. it's relaxing and it makes me feel like i have my shit together.
book-wise: a walk across america (peter jenkins), memoirs of a geisha (arthur golden).
So for the first few months alone on a desert island you will at least feel like you have your shit together
and in response to the snapshot picture. Alright smartass, not exactly a hot date, I'm just practicing for my next hot date with you.
You ever play Mario kart?
i guess i've played it like once.
Hah no response for the other texts? Did I leave you speechless?
were you looking for a response?
wait did you actually leave a message or not?
I didn't. The voicemail hung up on me lol. I didn't feel like trying again
not a big deal. :)
whatever I know your day was ruined because you're waiting for surprising you woke up and there was nothing. just bitterness, sadness, disappointment
If you could play any instrument what would it be and why?
i was actually a little disappointed... but yeah. piano. because.
well I was disappointed that you went to bed so early on a Friday night.
I think its your turn on scrabble =)
i was exhausted from the night before and i had to get up at 7...so sue me. i did offer to let you tell me then, though!
Oh I didn't know you had to get up early! Why?
i had something planned for the afternoon but i also had to go to the grocery and make scones for my sunday school class tomorrow. so i just needed an early start.
...make me scones. What did you do today?
scone production occurs mainly in atlanta. i went to a museum and just now a movie. what about you?
Ill probably be in atlanta in late march. So.. make it happen. I played some video games. Moved some stocks, and work.
What movie?
rust and bone.
Haven't heard of that.what is it? Have you seen the Hobbit?
it's a french film. you should look it up, it was really good. and yeah, i saw it over break.
I saw it over your break too. Why didn't we see it together? XD thelast french film I saw was la cage aux folles.
What time do you plan to go to bed tonight? Early so you can shower people in scones right?
yeah, i'm just getting home but my main concern right now is bed. did you need something?
yeah I needed to make sure I didn't keep you up later than youre comfortable. goodnight!
thanks babe. night.
When is your spring break?
march 9-17, why?
Because ill be down there the 20th
in ft. lauderdale?
No, atlanta.
the suspense is killing me!
Oh, for scones, baby.
And a day to remember.
oh. but why that day in particular?
I told you why- a day to remember.
oops, replied too quickly, i guess. at the tabernacle?
I think so. Too bad you'll be in florida. I'm going to see the devil wears prada at themusic farm the 14th lol
...but i won't be in florida.
also i do not understand your music tastes.
Ft lauderdale is just north of miami. I'm lost
http://m.youtube.com/results?q=a%20day%20to%20remember%20since%20u%20been%20gone#/watch?v=Gy4Uq86QbaE
my break is the 9-17. the 20th is not in that range.
I know. I'm going to two shows. One 14th at music farm, one 20th in atlanta. I lament not being able to see you on both occasions.
wtf is wrong with you. i will be in atlanta on the 20th.
Yes. Rofl try to stay with me. I will be able to see you when I go to see a day to remember. But not be able to see you the 14th. So not able to see you on both
ohhh. okay.
So... Did you want to see me when I come to Atlanta? =P
are you staying after the show, or going straight home?
Depends on you and how fucked up my buddy is. Hell I could tell him to get lost and we could knock off a place or two on your list lol.
bros before hoes, man. if you're curious, i have class 9:30 to 4:30 on wednesdays with like an hour lunch break. woohooooo
My bro knows if a pretty hoe shows that he goes with the flow
Which means he'll lay low fo' sho'
oh god. you're done.
Take your frat house colloquialism and shove it. ;)
all i can think about is how angry nari would be if i did that.
My friend just wants to get drunk before the show. Girls are shitty friends. I wasn't planning on not telling him beforehand
How a friend is supposed to react: "something makes you happy? Well good for you. I'm happy for you too"

no no, it's a drunken "how could you leave me by myself?! i felt so awkward!" i've never gone home without her when it was just the two of us but she doesn't even like me to dance with a guy if it's just the two of us and she's not dancing with anyone.
Sounds needy. Like I said, i'll run it by him. If he is as weird as your nari is then I won't do it lol
and that consideration is all i needed to hear. :)
Did you listen to the song?
You made fun of my little old phone, but at least I have unlimited data. =P also you called me babe the other day- I liked it.
The song I sent is "since U been gone" by a day to remember. It cracks me up.
yeah, i watched it.
when's your birthday?
Jan 7
did i know that already? did i wish you happy birthday?
No you didn't know. So you couldn't have wished me it.
why didn't you tell me?
Well.. I tried talking to you. That's why I pushed hanging out with you. You were my late birthday sex lol
"don't need no candles or cake" etc. you should've just said something.
